altTitles.en: 悪態は吐息とまざりあう

description.en:
1: Curses Showered On The Visitor  
"Do not deceive people. Do not threaten people. Do not handcuff people. Any illegal activity is forbidden." said Natsume, as he lays down the ground rules for Touji, the stalker…  
  
2: Curses Divert The Craving  
Natsume is having a bad day; he has just lost a major deal to a rival company. To make matters worse, he runs into his ex-colleague and finds out that he is the one who stole his deal from him.  
  
3: Curses Mingled With Sighs  
Touji flies into a rage when he finds out that Ryouji, Natsume's cousin and boss, is going to visit his place.  
  
4: Curses Make The Birthday Colourful  
Touji is busy with exam preparations and disappears on Natsume. After a few days, he finally turns up but he is sick.  
  
5: Curses Can Cover The Ears  
Natsume meets Souya, Touji's cousin, who is even more unnerving than his stalker.
